message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $125. I believe that reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $122.50 for the product.
